content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good day, Maria. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25-square-meter apartment in Mannheim is negotiable. What are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to pay 400 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?

I'm sorry, I made a mistake. I meant 500 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I apologize for the confusion earlier. I can accept a rental price of 500 Euros per month for this apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. Thank you for the opportunity to rent this apartment.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment is available for rent starting next month. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
name: Heinrich Heine
